In England, in the seven days to 23 June, there were 72,445 new confirmed cases (128.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 June, there were 50,684 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 43% (21,761 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 28 June is 4,136,940 (7,315.5 cases per 100,000 population).
